sect1.title: Acknowledgement
sect1.para: Thanks to Brian Farrelly, Norsk Hydro Research Centre, Bergen, Norway, for supplying functions to convert between IBM Floating Point format and doubles. (June, 2002. ver 0.35 ->)
Thanks to Urs Boeringer for adding a patch to WriteSegy, to enable use of an arbitrary set of TraceHeader values. (March 2007. ver 1.08 ->)
Thanks to Sourceforge for hosting the project.
